function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Origins of the virus in Wuhan, an industrialized city in China","Impact":"Potential for the virus to spread rapidly in densely populated urban areas","Mitigation":"Early detection, containment measures, and strict public health protocols","Technologies":"Contact tracing, testing technology, and data analytics for early detection","People":"Residents of Wuhan and densely populated urban areas","Owner":"Public health organizations and government authorities"},{"Description":"Immediate economic impacts of the virus on international trade, air travel, and employment","Impact":"Disruption of global supply chains, reduction in tourism, and job losses","Mitigation":"Diversification of supply chains, promotion of domestic tourism, and support for affected industries","Technologies":"Remote work technology, digital commerce platforms, and virtual communication tools","People":"Workers, businesses, and industries affected by international trade and travel","Owner":"Businesses, governments, and international organizations"},{"Description":"Identification and classification of the novel COVID-19 virus","Impact":"Understanding the genetic characteristics of the virus and its potential mutations","Mitigation":"Genomic sequencing, global collaboration on virus research, and vaccine development","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing technology, bioinformatics tools, and vaccine development platforms","People":"Global scientific community, healthcare researchers, and public health agencies","Owner":"Research institutions, pharmaceutical companies, and international health organizations"}]}
